sand_attack.name: Sand Attack
sand_attack.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

bone_club.name: Bone Club
bone_club.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
effects: double damage if target used Dig

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
